actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gladiator makes two melee attacks with their spear or throws two javelins.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shield
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Shield Rush
bonus_actions.desc: The gladiator makes an attack with their shield. On a hit, the target makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, falling prone on a failure.

reactions.name: Shield Block
reactions.desc: If the gladiator is wielding a shield and can see their attacker, they add 3 to their AC against one melee or ranged attack that would hit them.

special_abilities.name: Combat Expertise
special_abilities.desc: The damage of the gladiators attacks includes a d6 expertise die.
